pageContext.claim: “And by the way, Kanye West must have some power because you probably saw, I doubled my African-American poll numbers. We went from 11 to 22 in one week. Thank you, Kanye, thank you.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is citing a subsample of a Reuters poll that is too small to be statistically reliable -- and the numbers were for African-American men, not all African-Americans.
